title: So Lux gets another Skin, while there are Champs that dont for like 4 years... :-D
body:
Zílean {{champion:26}} , Udyr {{champion:77}} Xerath {{champion:101}} ...
 I think are the champions at not receving Skins for long. 
Others also, but I dont remember which (There was a thread/post with a list of them IIRC).

But Lux and others (Very popular champions, and with huge diversity of Skins), get often.
I think she got the Pijama Skin lately? Now she gets another... :C
